title: hey guys
body:
kk im busy playing LoL. Just then the power goes off and i was into 20 minutes of the game. when the power came back maybe after 30 minutes, i was given a leaver buster. Now are leaver busters random or is someone behind the computer screen checking the previous match i afked? just a simple question cause i left one game a week ago but never received it. 
I also contacted riot asking the same question but no reply.

replies.body:
[Here is the full FAQ about the leaver buster system. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

TL;DR

* Leaverbuster is **automatically ** applied if the system detects you leaving to many match-made games (you can leave customs).
* Unless it is a leave from ranked (treated harsher than other modes), you won't _usually _ be placed in LPQ after one leave (Riot understands that sometimes things do happen, but if you make a habit of AFK you will be punished)
* There are different tiers of LPQ (ranging from 5-20 minute waits), and you will be in LPQ for 5 games. 
* You can't be removed under _any_ circumstances.

Hope this helped ♥
yeah, you got a low priority queue. Deal with it, dont dc during the low priority queue's or you'll get harsher bans

consider that similar to driving merit point.
The more you break the low, the less your point has due to point demerit, and eventually.. you are out
